item.title: By: Matt & Judith
item.dc:creator: Matt & Judith
item.description: <p>Happy Xmas to everyone in the UK thank you for all our presents and have a great day it's only 65 degrees today the coolest so far!! hope your not too jelous! See you soon Happy Holidays!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Happy Xmas to everyone in the UK thank you for all our presents and have a great day it’s only 65 degrees today the coolest so far!! hope your not too jelous! See you soon Happy Holidays!!

item.title: By: Ed (dad)
item.dc:creator: Ed (dad)
item.description: <p>We wish you all a merry christmas love Jim and Dad</p>
item.content:encoded: We wish you all a merry christmas love Jim and Dad

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: <p>Looks like its a bit sunnier there now! We had snow on monday and it was proper ie it laid! hope u enjoyed universal, it's brilliant there! And hope you've already bought me loads of presents!! Happy Christmas</p>
item.content:encoded: Looks like its a bit sunnier there now! We had snow on monday and it was proper ie it laid! hope u enjoyed universal, it’s brilliant there! And hope you’ve already bought me loads of presents!! Happy Christmas
